AllocationResponseGameServerAllocationSt.description:
- Allocated: Allocated is for successful allocation
 - UnAllocated: UnAllocated is for unsuccessful allocation due to lack of gameserver resources
 - Contention: Contention is for unsuccessful allocation due to contention
AllocationResponseGameServerAllocationSt.title: The allocation state

AllocationResponseGameServerStatusPort.description: The gameserver port info that is allocated.

matchLabels.title:
matchLabels is a map of {key,value} pairs. A single {key,value} in the matchLabels
map is equivalent to an element of matchExpressions, whose key field is "key", the
operator is "In", and the values array contains only "value". The requirements are ANDed.
+optional

matchExpressions.title:
matchExpressions is a list of label selector requirements. The requirements are ANDed.
+optional

v1LabelSelector.description:
A label selector is a label query over a set of resources. The result of matchLabels and
matchExpressions are ANDed. An empty label selector matches all objects. A null
label selector matches no objects.

key.title:
key is the label key that the selector applies to.
+patchMergeKey=key
+patchStrategy=merge

operator.description:
operator represents a key's relationship to a set of values.
Valid operators are In, NotIn, Exists and DoesNotExist.

values.title:
values is an array of string values. If the operator is In or NotIn,
the values array must be non-empty. If the operator is Exists or DoesNotExist,
the values array must be empty. This array is replaced during a strategic
merge patch.
+optional

v1LabelSelectorRequirement.description:
A label selector requirement is a selector that contains values, a key, and an operator that
relates the key and values.

namespace.title: The k8s namespace that is hosting the targeted fleet of gameservers to be allocated

multiClusterSetting.description: If specified, multi-cluster policies are applied. Otherwise, allocation will happen locally.

requiredGameServerSelector.description: The required allocation. Defaults to all GameServers.

preferredGameServerSelectors.description:
The ordered list of preferred allocations out of the `required` set.
If the first selector is not matched, the selection attempts the second selector, and so on.

metaPatch.title:
MetaPatch is optional custom metadata that is added to the game server at
allocation You can use this to tell the server necessary session data

v1alpha1MetaPatch.title: MetaPatch is the metadata used to patch the GameServer metadata on allocation

enabled.description: If set to true, multi-cluster allocation is enabled.

policySelector.description: Selects multi-cluster allocation policies to apply. If not specified, all multi-cluster allocation policies are to be applied.
